jcurses.event
类 WindowEvent

java.lang.Object
  jcurses.event.Event
      jcurses.event.WindowEvent

public class WindowEvent
extends Event

Instances of this class are generated, if the status of a window is modified. for example, if an window is closed.

字段摘要
static int ACTIVATED
           
static int CLOSED

构造方法详细信息

WindowEvent

public WindowEvent(Window sourceWindow,
                   int type)
The constructor

参数：
sourceWindow - the affected window
type - the type of the event, must be equal to one of four following constants:
ACTIVATED - the window has got the focus
DEACTIVATED - the window has lost the focus
CLOSE - the window has been closed
CLOSING - the window has begun the process of closing
方法详细信息

getType

public int getType()
返回：
the type of the event

getSourceWindow

public Window getSourceWindow()
返回：
the affected window
